stages.logText: I talked to Anakis. He told me, that his brother went into the cave and never came out again.
I agreed to help Anakis to find his brother.
Anakis heared that there is a monster in the cave that can turn people to stone.
I found a stone statue looking like a real human.
I told Anakis about the statue. He thinks that it is his brother and thanks me for helping.
Anakis asked me if I could take revenge for his brother.
I agreed to take revenge for Anakis brother by finding the stone turning monster.
I killed the Basilisk, that turns people to stone.
I told Anakis about killing the Basilisk and he rewarded me with some gold.
